description: Detects files written by the different tools that exploit HiveNightmare Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Files that accidentally contain these strings
name: Typical HiveNightmare SAM File Export
query: (file.path:(*\\hive_sam_* OR *\\SAM\-2021\-* OR *\\SAM\-2022\-* OR *\\SAM\-haxx* OR *\\Sam.save*) OR file.path:"C\:\\windows\\temp\\sam")
